San Juan to Vieques Tour

Posted in Maps, Friday_Harbor

Where is Vieques ? Isla de Vieques is a large island approximately 8 miles off the coast of Puerto Rico.

Does Vieques have a Bioluminescent Bay? Yes; Vieques island is known for it’s micro-organism infested Bioluminescent Bay. The luminescence is from a micro-organism named Pyrodinium bahamense and it glows blue when the water is disturbed.

Do they have tours running from San Juan to Vieques? Kayak tours start from Esperanza; which is a small town with a population of about 1000.

How far is it from San Juan to Vieques? About 8 miles.

How much does a San Juan to Vieques tour cost? About $50. We recommend you checkout Abe’s Snorkeling and Bio-Bay Tours.
